laboratory_examinations.findings: Troponin I: 1.19 g/L (normal <0.04 g/L), CK-MB: 7.8 g/L (normal 0â€“6 g/L)
Evidence of septal mid-wall late gadolinium enhancement compatible with septal perforation; chronic inferior wall subendocardial infarct observed.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up CMR scan 8 weeks after PCI showed a small area of focal fibrosis in the mid septum, less prominent than previously, likely representing infarct resorption.
